snippet.title: The Outer Zone - Gameplay Trailer - New Turn-Based Stealth Scavenge Tactics Game
snippet.description:
Lead a caravan of survivors through a world on the brink of collapse. Scavenge for resources, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and make difficult choices in this turn-based strategy roguelite. Will you survive long enough to reach the Outer Zone?

Play the free demo on Steam now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1917230/The_Outer_Zone_Survival_Tactics/

If you enjoyed the demo, Wishlist on Steam and share! Follow us on Steam or Twitter to keep up to date with the project! 

==== L I N K S ====
Steam Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1917230/The_Outer_Zone_Survival_Tactics/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SappyGameStudio
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/2d9Ag6DTAe
